text_content: “Expansion microscopy gives you opportunities that aren’t available with anything else.” New @nature.com, Elie Dolgin reports on a decade of expansion microscopy (#ExM), 10 yrs old this week, which brings super-res microscopy to all. Feat. @eboyden3.bsky.social. 🧪 www.nature.com/articles/d41...

embeds.title: ‘Expansion microscopy’ turns ten: how a tissue-swelling method brought super-resolution imaging to the masses
embeds.description: A decade in, expansion microscopy is unlocking insights across biology and medicine.
